mapper.select: select * from base_box where boxcode=#{boxcode} and boxname=#{boxname} and boxtype=#{boxtype} and status=#{status} and creator=#{creator} and createdt=#{createdt} and modifyby=#{modifyby} and modifydt=#{modifydt}
mapper.insert: insert base_box （ boxcode, boxname, boxtype, status, creator, createdt, modifyby, modifydt) values( #{boxcode}, #{boxname}, #{boxtype}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{createdt}, #{modifyby}, #{modifydt})
mapper.update: update base_box set boxcode=#{boxcode}, boxname=#{boxname}, boxtype=#{boxtype}, status=#{status}, creator=#{creator}, createdt=#{createdt}, modifyby=#{modifyby}, modifydt=#{modifydt} where rowid=#{rowid}
